article_title: Leave Lebanon now, Starmer tells Britons
sentence: Tensions  have  been  growing  across  the  Middle  East  since  Hamas  gunmen  attacked  Israel  on  7  October  last  year,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  251  others  as  hostages.

article_title: Leave Lebanon now, Starmer tells Britons
sentence: The  Israel  military  campaign  in  Gaza  in  response  to  the  Hamas  attack  has  killed  more  than  41,000  people,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
